title: What's new in v2.46.2
content:
- Multiple tiles can be selected
- When multiple tiles are selected, tools will apply them randomly
- Added secondary color activation, content flip, and canvas flip to the keyboard shortcut list
- Added symbol keys to the keyboard key list
- Added the "Only selected area" option when converting a regular layer to a tilemap layer
- Fixed tile bucket doesn't use the new selected tile
- Better default new file name
- Fixed frame dots can see through layer name
- Fixed canvas resize being a bit jumpy
